description: Try our easy to follow Chocolate Crinkle Cookies recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Cookie,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Baking,Quick & easy dessert,Christmas,Soy free,Vegetarian,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Chocolate Crinkle Cookies Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: In a medium bowl combine cocoa, sugar and oil. Beat in eggs, one at a time, and mix in vanilla.
Add flour, baking powder and a pinch of salt and mix until dough forms. Cover and refrigerate for two hours or until mixture is firm.
Preheat oven to 160Â°C. Line two baking trays with baking paper.
Remove cookie dough from fridge and use clean hands to roll tablespoons of mixture into balls and coat generously in icing sugar. Place balls on prepared tray at least 4cm apart.
Bake for 15 minutes or until approximately 6cm in diameter. Remove from oven and allow to cool completely on trays. Store in an airtight container.
